sec.title: 摘要
sec.p: 本文主要研究了以下具有Dirichlet边界条件的椭圆方程在 B R ( 0 ) 中正径向对称解的存在性： − d i v ( | x | − 2 a ∇ u ) = μ u | x | 2 ( 1 + a ) + u 2 ∗ ( a , s ) − 1 − ε | x | s ， u > 0 。其中 0 ≤ a < μ ¯ ， μ ¯ = ( N − 2 2 ) 2 ， 2 ∗ ( a , s ) = 2 ( N − s ) N − 2 ( 1 + a ) ， 2 N a N − 2 ≤ s < 2 ( 1 + a ) ， 0 < ε < 2 ∗ ( a , s ) − 1 ， 0 ≤ μ < ( μ ¯ − a ) 2 且 2 ∗ ( a , s ) 是临界指数。我们主要利用山路引理、Moser迭代和比较原理证明该方程正径向对称解的存在性。

sec.title: ABSTRACT
sec.p: In this paper, we study the existence of positive radial symmetric solutions of − d i v ( | x | − 2 a ∇ u ) = μ u | x | 2 ( 1 + a ) + u 2 ∗ ( a , s ) − 1 − ε | x | s , u > 0 in B R ( 0 ) with Dirichlet boundary condition. Here, 0 ≤ a < μ ¯ , μ ¯ = ( N − 2 2 ) 2 , 2 ∗ ( a , s ) = 2 ( N − s ) N − 2 ( 1 + a ) , 2 N a N − 2 ≤ s < 2 ( 1 + a ) , 0 < ε < 2 ∗ ( a , s ) − 1 , 0 ≤ μ < ( μ ¯ − a ) 2 and 2 ∗ ( a , s ) is a critical exponent. We mainly prove the existence of positive radial symmetric solution of the equation by using the mountain pass lemma, Moser iteration and comparison principle.
Keywords:Hardy-Sobolev Critical Exponent, Mountain Pass Lemma, Moser Iteration, Comparison Principle
